resources.string: There is no cell active. Select a cell first.

NanoPond is copyrighted by Pieter Pareit (pieter.pareit@gmail.com). The artwork was created by Birgit Niemegeers.


NanoPond runs a virtual machine in which 'life' can develop. This virtual machine is a port of a java program by Thomas Abeel, who in turn based his virtual machine on the c code of Adam Ierymenko. NanoPond was used in a Computational Intelligence course at the university of Ghent.


This program is released under the GNU Public License Version 3. The programs on which it is based where released under the GPL 2.


This program comes with absolutely no warranty.
